oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Fostering Productive Relationships with Your Client's Hispanic Workforce
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Estrada, Jorge M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: communication
client relationship
rapport
productive relationship
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Successful veterinarians have the ability to develop relationships that last. Building relationships requires the building of trust. Successful veterinarians know that their technical skills and knowledge will only get them so far, the rest of the work is built on the interpersonal skills they have an continue to acquire throughout their career.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2008; 195-197
